Yellowstone County added 55 new cases.  Big Horn and Jefferson Counties added four cases each… [+355 chars]

articles.author: Lucy Johnston, Exclusive
articles.title: Coronavirus cancer delay: More than 60,000 years of life will be lost - Express
articles.description: MORE than 60,000 years of life will be lost by 2025 because of cancer diagnosis delays caused by the coronavirus, shocking research has warned.
